            <string language="x-mt-fr">La structure du neurone</string>

            <string language="en">Drawing about a neuron's structure</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">idegsejt,  axon,  neuron,  dendrit,  velőshüvely,  </string>
